content: In the 1997 film "Titanic," which two actors played the lead roles of Jack Dawson and Rose DeWitt Bukater?

In the 1997 film "Titanic," Leonardo DiCaprio played the character Jack Dawson, and Kate Winslet portrayed Rose DeWitt Bukater. The movie, directed by James Cameron, tells the fictionalized account of the sinking of the RMS Titanic and the tragic love story between Jack and Rose. It was a huge commercial success and received numerous awards, including multiple Oscars.
